title: New: Dan Deacon – True Thrush
body: Amongst yesterday’s ultimate big-band-buzz day featuring new tracks from [Bloc Party](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/17216-new-bloc-party-octopus/), [The Killers](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/17275-new-the-killers-runaways/) and [Band of Horses](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/17301-new-band-of-horses-knock-knock/), this new cut from Dan Deacon slipped under most radars, including mine. Taken from **Deacon’s** forthcoming album _**America**_ out 27 August, _True Thrush_ is everything we’ve grown to love from the Baltimore composer. Erratic, danceable with touches of drug induced psychedelia. Check out _True Thrush_ below and pre-order _**America**_ [here.](http://dominorecordco.com/america)
